ActCanada Transportation Act
PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Transport to sign an agreement to provide financial assistance to the Comox Valley Airport Commission (CVAC) towards the costs associated with construction of essential civilian airside infrastructure at Canadian Forces Base Comox, in Vancouver (British Columbia).
